about_the_game:
The full original soundtrack for TinyKeep.
Composed, orchestrated and mastered by Will Bedford.
Album artwork by Phi Dinh.
Awful puns by Ben Jones.
Track 14 uses some in-game sounds by Jey Kazi.

All tracks provided as high quality 320kbps 44khz MP3 files in the TinyKeep folder on your computer.

1. TinyKeep
2. Saviour In The Dark
3. All Locked Up With Someplace To Go
4. Cobb and Twist
5. Pershdal Dungeons
6. A Bone Of Contention
7. Orcward Silences
8. The Party Shop
9. Sulphur So Good
10. An Alternate Dimension
11. The Final Choice
12. I Have A Bone To Pick With You
13. Credits
14. The Spinal Tap-Dance
15. Trailer (Bonus Track)
